GL (Gluten/Lactose) Free Diet

*Gluten/Lactose free dishes are available in Ala Carte only.
*We advise to tell the server if you have certain kind of food allergies.

Menu Description Per plate
Genoese Pasta in meat sauce 20
Cheese Stromboli Phillysteak with lactose-free cheese 15
Mussels Guiness & lemon, red, white or Fra Diavolo 13
